Video_title: LS | Message from Rajya Sabha | 4 April, 2025
Description:
#budget2025 #budgetsession2025 #unionbudget2025

transcript.formattedContent: <text start='0'>[संगीत]</text><text start='1'>सभासदों, माननीय अध्यक्ष जी, महासचिव।</text><text start='16'>Sir, I have to report that Rajya Sabha at its sitting held on the 3rd and 4th April 2025, agreed without any amendment to The Waqf Amendment Bill, 2025 and The Musalman Waqf Repeal Bill, 2025, as passed by Lok Sabha.</text><text start='35'>आप किरण जी, कुछ बोलना चाह रहे थे?</text><text start='39'>मैं।</text>
